issue.subject: The contact list is no longer displayed on SQLServer
issue.description:
Lors de l'affichage des contacts, j'obtiens l'erreur suivante:

[Microsoft][SQL Server Native Client 11.0][SQL Server]Error converting data type varchar to bigint. SQL=SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.checked_out, a.checked_out_time, a.created_by, a.ordering,a.state,a.catid,([o].[name]+' ['+[o].[id]+']') AS member_organism, o.id as member_organism_id,u.name, u.username ,uc.name AS editor,ag.title AS access_level,c.title AS category_title , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY u.name asc) AS RowNumber FROM #__#__user AS a LEFT JOIN #__users AS u ON u.id=a.user_id LEFT JOIN #__#__user_role_organism uro ON uro.user_id=a.id AND uro.role_id=1 LEFT JOIN #__#__organism o ON uro.organism_id=o.id LEFT JOIN #__users AS uc ON uc.id=a.checked_out LEFT JOIN #__viewlevels AS ag ON ag.id = a.access LEFT JOIN #__categories AS c ON c.id = a.catid WHERE (a.state IN (0, 1)) ) A WHERE A.RowNumber BETWEEN 1 AND 15

C'est dû à la ligne 128 du fichier administrator\components\com_easysdi_contact\models\users.php 

$query->concatenate(array($db->qn('o.name'), "' ['", $db->qn('o.id'), "']'"))  la concaténation de type différent n'est pas supporté.

details.name: subject
details.old_value: The contact list is no longer displayed.
details.new_value: The contact list is no longer displayed on SQLServer
